metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44940 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Patchelf v0.9 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read via the function modifyRPath at src/patchelf.cc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-44940` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

patchelf - 0.14.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: eslerm> version 0.10 and earlier require extensive backport

criterions.comment: patchelf package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.14.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
